name: 蒼葉
message: "What do you mean you just felt like it? You've never done anything like this before. Are you sure you're feeling okay?"

name: 蓮
message: "I do still feel a little strange... but it's nothing you need to worry about."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No, it's definitely something I need to worry about. You're acting really weird. Do you not get that?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Seriously? Shit. I really need to take a proper look at you... Wish I had the right tools..."

name: 蓮
message: "You don't need to be so concerned. My basic functions are unaffected."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Like hell they aren't! ...I'm really worried about you."
I pick up Ren and look into his eyes.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Look, I'm begging you, don't run off like that again. I'm gonna get you fixed, I promise. Just try to behave so it doesn't get any worse, okay?"

name: 蓮
message: "It's really not that big a deal..."

name: 蓮
message: "...I understand. I'll be careful. I'm sorry."
I almost press my forehead against Ren's like I always do, but I stop myself.
I'm scared he'll push me away again.
It's so frustrating, not having the tools to take care of him.
